title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the column aliases that have been set.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking the first column name, the alias name 'column1' should be displayed instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new data source and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as "column1".
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Select the dataset in the expression builder.
